articles.title: Watch: CNN reporter breaks down unique nature of GDP decline - CNN Video
articles.description: The US economy shrank again in the second quarter as the gross domestic product fell by 0.9% on an annualized basis from April through June, according to the Bureau of Economic Analysis. CNN's Christine Romans explains why this fuels fear of recession.

articles.title: Video: Sales in the housing market are down but prices are up  - CNN Video
articles.description: Housing market sales are down but prices are still surging. Daryl Fairweather, chief economist for Redfin, explains to "Nightcap's" Jon Sarlin the mixed messages in the housing market and what's next for home prices. To get the day's business headlines sent d…

articles.author: Danielle Wiener-Bronner, CNN Business
articles.title: Inflation-exhausted Americans: Let's just go out for steak
articles.description: Inflation is soaring. And yet restaurant-goers are having a love affair with a high-budget item: Steak.

articles.author: Martha White for CNN Business
articles.title: US economy contracts again, fueling recession fears
articles.description: The US economy shrank again in the second quarter, the Bureau of Economic Analysis said Thursday.

articles.author: Anna Bahney, CNN Business
articles.title: Mortgage rates fall as fears about the US economy loom
articles.description: Mortgage rates dropped last week, as rates continue to fluctuate fears that the US economy is entering a recession build.

articles.author: Kate Sullivan, CNN
articles.title: Biden says nation is 'on the right path' despite latest GDP report fueling recession fears
articles.description: President Joe Biden said Thursday the nation is "on the right path" despite recession fears fueled by the latest report from the Commerce Department showing the US economy shrank again in the second quarter.
articles.content: (CNN)President Joe Biden said Thursday the nation is "on the right path" despite recession fears fueled by the latest report from the Commerce Department showing the US economy shrank again in the se… [+2986 chars]

articles.author: Julia Horowitz, CNN Business
articles.title: Why stocks are so weird right now
articles.description: Before the Federal Reserve announced another supersized interest rate hike on Wednesday, investors told Before the Bell they had no problem with the central bank's messaging that it would continue to aggressively fight decades-high inflation.
articles.content: A version of this story first appeared in CNN Business' Before the Bell newsletter. Not a subscriber? You can sign up right here. You can listen to an audio version of the newsletter by clicking the … [+8350 chars]

articles.author: Natasha Chen
articles.title: This region is suffering from some of the highest inflation in America. Here's how locals are surviving
articles.description: To make ends meet amid soaring inflation, one resident has been selling her gold jewelry and crushing aluminum cans to recycle for extra cash.
articles.content: Riverside, California (CNN)For 17 years, Ana Duran worked full time as a travel counselor. Late last year she lost that job, shortly before seeing the price of eggs rise to $7.99 a dozen and the pric… [+6084 chars]

articles.author: Nicole Goodkind, CNN Business
articles.title: Fed makes history with second massive rate hike in as many months
articles.description: What seemed unfathomable just six months ago -- a 75-basis-point rate hike by the Federal Reserve -- has now happened twice in a row.

articles.author: Jennifer Agiesta, CNN Polling Director
articles.title: CNN Poll: Most Americans are discontented with Biden, the economy and the state of the country
articles.description: The summer of 2022 is a season of deepening and widespread discontent, according to a new CNN poll conducted by SSRS. The survey finds the public's outlook on the state of the country the worst it's been since 2009, while its view on the economy is the worst …
